r.d: This is the Interbase/Firebird MDB2 driver.
r.n: - initial support for FOREIGN KEY and CHECK constraints in the Reverse and Manager modules - fixed bug #11428: propagate quote() errors with invalid data types - fixed bug #11790: avoid array_diff() because it has a memory leak in PHP 5.1.x - fixed some E_STRICT errors with PHP5 - fixed bug #12083: createTable() in the Manager module now returns MDB2_OK on success, as documented
